solution_line_template: The amount she spends on buying drinks is ${unit_cost_drink}*{num_drinks}= $<<{unit_cost_drink}*{num_drinks}={drinks_total}>>{drinks_total}.
The amount she spends on buying cakes is ${unit_cost_cake}*{num_cakes}= $<<{unit_cost_cake}*{num_cakes}={cakes_total}>>{cakes_total}.
The amount she spends on buying ice creams is ${unit_cost_ice_cream}*{num_ice_creams}=$<<{unit_cost_ice_cream}*{num_ice_creams}={ice_creams_total}>>{ice_creams_total}.
The total amount she spends is ${drinks_total}+${cakes_total}+${ice_creams_total}=$<<{drinks_total}+{cakes_total}+{ice_creams_total}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}
